00018 #ifndef   BITVEC_H
00019 #define   BITVEC_H
00020 
00021 #include "host.h"
00022 
00023 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024           Include Files and Type Defines
00025 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00026 // TODO(rays) Rename BITSINLONG to BITSINuinT32, and use sizeof.
00027 #define BITSINLONG      32       
00028 typedef uinT32 *BIT_VECTOR;
00029 
00030 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031           Public Function Prototypes
00032 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00033 #define zero_all_bits(array,length) \
00034 {\
00035     register int            index;                        /*temporary index*/\
00036 \
00037 for (index=0;index<length;index++)\
00038     array[index]=0;                                        /*zero all bits*/\
00039 }
00040 
00041 #define set_all_bits(array,length) \
00042 {\
00043     register int            index;                        /*temporary index*/\
00044 \
00045 for (index=0;index<length;index++)\
00046     array[index]= ~0;                                    /*set all bits*/\
00047 }
00048 
00049 #define copy_all_bits(source,dest,length) \
00050 {\
00051     register int            index;                        /*temporary index*/\
00052 \
00053 for (index=0;index<length;index++)\
00054     dest[index]=source[index];                            /*copy all bits*/\
00055 }
00056 
00057 #define SET_BIT(array,bit) (array[bit/BITSINLONG]|=1<<(bit&(BITSINLONG-1)))
00058 
00059 #define reset_bit(array,bit) (array[bit/BITSINLONG]&=~(1<<(bit&(BITSINLONG-1))))
00060 
00061 #define test_bit(array,bit) (array[bit/BITSINLONG] & (1<<(bit&(BITSINLONG-1))))
00062 
00063 #define WordsInVectorOfSize(NumBits) \
00064 (((NumBits) + BITSINLONG - 1) / BITSINLONG)
00065 
00066 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067         Public Function Prototypes
00068 --------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 BIT_VECTOR ExpandBitVector(BIT_VECTOR Vector, int NewNumBits);
00070 
00071 void FreeBitVector(BIT_VECTOR BitVector);
00072 
00073 int hamming_distance(uinT32* array1, uinT32* array2, int length);
00074 
00075 BIT_VECTOR NewBitVector(int NumBits);
00076 
00077 #endif
